#### Attempt to reproduce the code

https://katagotraining.org/

#### Installation

```{r, eval=FALSE}
#sh
py -m pip install -U katrain
py -m katrain
```

#### Code Clone

```{r, eval=FALSE}
#sh
git clone https://github.com/lightvector/KataGo.git

cd KataGo

nano src/main.cpp  # check main.cpp 
```

#### Check Main

```{r, eval=FALSE}
#python
import os
os.system("nano src/main.cpp")
```
